FuncDef:
The sflow command enables sFlow globally and displays the sFlow view.
The undo sflow command disables sFlow globally and deletes all configurations in the sFlow view.
By default, the sFlow function is disabled.
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
Before configuring sFlow, run the sflow command to enable sFlow and enter the sFlow view.
Precautions
sFlow and NetStream are mutually exclusive.
